content: कवि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कु-इ <ls>Uṇ. 4. 138</ls>] {@--1@} Omniscient; <ls>Bg. 8. 9</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 24.</ls> {@--2@} Intelligent, clever, wise. {@--3@} Thinking, thoughtful. {@--4@} Praiseworthy. --विः {@--1@} A wise man, a thinker, a sage; कवीनामुशना कविः <ls>Bg. 10. 37</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">2. 151.</ls> {@--2@} A poet; तद्ब्रूहि रामचरितं आद्यः कविरसि <ls>U. 2</ls>; मंदः कवियशःप्रार्थी <ls>R. 1. 3</ls>; इदं कविभ्यः पूर्वेभ्यो नमोवाकं प्रशास्महे <ls>U. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 86.</ls> {@--3@} An epithet of Śukra, the preceptor of the Asuras; कविरिव वृषपर्वणः <ls>K. 56.</ls> {@--4@} Vālmīki, the first poet. {@--5@} Brahmā. {@--6@} The sun. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} The bit of a bridle; see कविका.
